channel.title: healthTest
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from healthTest, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New limits on school loans could narrow physician and nurse pipeline, educators warn
item.description: Under new Trump administration rules, students won't be able to borrow as much for medical or nursing school or some other health professions.

item.title: Women with gestational diabetes may avoid health care due to stigma and stereotypes
item.description: It's important women receive high-quality health care during pregnancy—particularly if they have gestational diabetes.

item.title: MRIs reveal genetic clues in cerebral palsy
item.description: A national study by University of Adelaide researchers is paving the way for more precise diagnosis and treatment for children with cerebral palsy.

item.title: Access to ophthalmologists improved from 2014 to 2024, research shows
item.description: Overall access to ophthalmologists improved from 2014 to 2024, according to a research letter published in JAMA Ophthalmology.
